verbs.description: [ARG1: small vintage plane] [V: crashes] [ARGM-LOC: on southern california freeway] a small plane crashed on the northbound 101 freeway in the agoura hills area on tuesday afternoon leaving all lanes shut down in both directions the pilot of the plane issued an emergency alert at around 1 45 p m la county fire department agoura hills lost hills southern california freeway las virgenes freeway california l a county fire department ktla california highway patrol
